verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Surrender to Me, surrender to Me,
For I have surrendered to thee.
Lift up your hands, and surrender to Me,
For I have surrendered to Thee.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Call unto Me, call unto Me,
For I am calling to thee.
Thou art the chosen; it is I who have chosen,
Therefore I'm calling to thee.
